articles.title: Trump indictment: Shush emojis and orders from the boss - charges in full - BBC
articles.description: A revised indictment sets out new charges against Donald Trump, Walt Nauta and another employee.
articles.content:
Media caption, Watch: How much do you know about classified documents?
Federal prosecutors have widened their criminal investigation into Donald Trump over his handling of government documents after… [+3556 chars]
